title: Erdheim-Chester Disease: Clinical Overview
short_description: Clinical overview of Erdheim-Chester Disease (ECD), a rare adult disorder with typical onset in middle age.
long_description: This document provides a clinical overview of Erdheim-Chester Disease (ECD), a rare disorder that primarily affects adults with an average age of onset in the mid-50s. The document discusses the epidemiological characteristics of the disease, noting that more than 100 cases have been documented in medical literature with a slight male predominance. The disease is named after the two original investigators who first described this condition, establishing its place in medical nomenclature and research.
